headline: Arista’s Sales of AI Data Center Networks Were Good. Investors Wanted More.
summary: To keep up with their fast  Nvidia  chips, artificial-intelligence data centers need fast networks.  Apparently the growth that Arista reported Thursday night wasn’t as strong as its stock’s steep multiple demanded.  Arista projected sales growth next year of about 16%.

raw.headline: Arista’s Sales of AI Data Center Networks Were Good. Investors Wanted More.
